tours.title: Marrakech to Merzouga Desert Tour
tours.excerpt: A full 3 Days desert tour from Marrakech to Merzouga. Discover the Sahara Desert of Merzouga.
additionalInfo: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before the tour

tours.title: Marrakech to Erg Chegaga Tour
tours.excerpt: Discover the Erg Chegaga desert of Morocco and explore the fascinating village of M'hamid.

stops.title: Marrakech - Tizi N'Tichka Pass
stops.description: Drive through the High Atlas Mountains. Experience the winding roads and beautiful landscapes.

stops.title: Arrival in M'hamid
stops.description: Settle into your desert camp and enjoy a traditional dinner.

stops.title: Desert Exploration
stops.description: Spend the day exploring the dunes of Erg Chegaga.

stops.title: Return to Marrakech
stops.description: After breakfast, start your journey back to Marrakech.

tours.title: Morocco Imperial Cities Tour
tours.excerpt: Experience our long Morocco Imperial Tours, visit the most beautiful cities and villages from south to North.
additionalInfo: Visas and insurance are the responsibility of the traveler

stops.title: Casablanca - Rabat
stops.description: Visit the Hassan II Mosque in Casablanca before heading to Rabat.

stops.title: Rabat - Meknes - Fes
stops.description: Explore Rabat's key sites, then travel to Meknes and Fes.

stops.title: Fes Exploration
stops.description: Full day exploring the historical city of Fes.

stops.title: Fes - Ifrane - Midelt
stops.description: Drive through the Middle Atlas Mountains, stopping in Ifrane and Midelt.

stops.title: Midelt - Merzouga
stops.description: Continue your journey to the Sahara Desert.

stops.title: Merzouga - Erg Chebbi
stops.description: Experience the desert dunes and camel trek.

stops.title: Erg Chebbi - Dades Valley
stops.description: Travel through the Dades Valley and enjoy the stunning landscapes.

stops.title: Dades Valley - Marrakech
stops.description: End your tour in the vibrant city of Marrakech.

tours.title: Essaouira-Mogador Excursion
tours.excerpt: Enjoy the beauty of coastal city of Essouira, visit the portuges Port and the old Medina and live the Ganwi vibes.

stops.title: Marrakech - Essaouira
stops.description: Depart from Marrakech to the coastal city of Essaouira.

stops.title: Essaouira Medina
stops.description: Explore the historic Medina and the bustling markets.

stops.title: Essaouira Beach
stops.description: Relax at the beautiful beach and enjoy fresh seafood.

stops.title: Return to Marrakech
stops.description: Head back to Marrakech in the evening.

tours.title: Atlas Mountain Day Trip
tours.excerpt: Escape the city and explore the Atlas Mountains on this full-day adventure.

stops.title: Marrakech - Imlil
stops.description: Drive from Marrakech to the village of Imlil in the Atlas Mountains.

stops.title: Imlil - Aroumd
stops.description: Hike from Imlil to the village of Aroumd, enjoying stunning mountain views.

stops.title: Aroumd - Imlil
stops.description: Return to Imlil for lunch and explore the local markets.

stops.title: Return to Marrakech
stops.description: Head back to Marrakech in the evening.

tours.title: Chefchaouen Blue City Tour
tours.excerpt: Discover the stunning blue-washed streets of Chefchaouen.
additionalInfo: Bring a camera for the picturesque views

stops.title: Tangier - Chefchaouen
stops.description: Drive from Tangier to Chefchaouen and settle into your accommodation.

stops.title: Chefchaouen Medina
stops.description: Explore the enchanting Medina and its blue-washed streets.

stops.title: Chefchaouen - Tangier
stops.description: Enjoy a relaxed morning in Chefchaouen before returning to Tangier.

tours.title: Agadir City Tour
tours.excerpt: Explore the vibrant city of Agadir, its beaches, and markets.

stops.title: Agadir Beach
stops.description: Start your tour with a visit to the beautiful Agadir Beach.

stops.title: Agadir Medina
stops.description: Explore the traditional Medina and its bustling markets.

stops.title: Kasbah of Agadir
stops.description: Visit the historic Kasbah with panoramic views of the city.

stops.title: Return to Hotel
stops.description: Return to your hotel in the evening.

tours.title: Ouarzazate and Ait Ben Haddou
tours.excerpt: Visit the gateway to the Sahara and the historic Ait Ben Haddou Kasbah.

stops.title: Marrakech - Ouarzazate
stops.description: Drive from Marrakech to Ouarzazate, the gateway to the Sahara.

stops.title: Ait Ben Haddou
stops.description: Explore the historic Ait Ben Haddou Kasbah, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

stops.title: Return to Marrakech
stops.description: Head back to Marrakech in the evening.

tours.title: Rabat City Tour
tours.excerpt: Discover the capital city of Morocco, Rabat, and its rich history.

stops.title: Hassan Tower
stops.description: Visit the iconic Hassan Tower, an unfinished mosque dating back to the 12th century.

stops.title: Royal Palace
stops.description: Explore the exterior of the Royal Palace and its beautiful gardens.

stops.title: Kasbah of the Udayas
stops.description: Walk through the picturesque Kasbah of the Udayas, with stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean.

stops.title: Return to Hotel
stops.description: Return to your hotel in the evening.

tours.title: Tangier City Tour
tours.excerpt: Explore the vibrant city of Tangier, its beaches, and historic sites.

stops.title: Tangier Beach
stops.description: Start your tour with a visit to the beautiful Tangier Beach.

stops.title: Tangier Medina
stops.description: Explore the traditional Medina and its bustling markets.

stops.title: Kasbah Museum
stops.description: Visit the historic Kasbah Museum with its rich collection of artifacts.

stops.title: Return to Hotel
stops.description: Return to your hotel in the evening.

tours.title: Fes Medina Tour
tours.excerpt: Dive into the historic and cultural heart of Fes with this full-day Medina tour.

stops.title: Bou Inania Madrasa
stops.description: Visit the historic Bou Inania Madrasa, an architectural masterpiece.

stops.title: Al Quaraouiyine University
stops.description: Explore the world's oldest continually operating university.

stops.title: Chouara Tannery
stops.description: See the traditional leather tanning process at the Chouara Tannery.

stops.title: Return to Hotel
stops.description: Return to your hotel in the evening.

tours.title: Meknes Historical Tour
tours.excerpt: Discover the historic sites of Meknes, a UNESCO World Heritage site.

stops.title: Bab Mansour
stops.description: Visit the grand gateway of Bab Mansour, an iconic landmark of Meknes.

stops.title: Mausoleum of Moulay Ismail
stops.description: Explore the beautifully preserved Mausoleum of Moulay Ismail.

stops.title: Heri es-Souani
stops.description: Discover the historic granaries and stables of Heri es-Souani.

stops.title: Return to Hotel
stops.description: Return to your hotel in the evening.

reviews.author: John Doe
reviews.reviewDescription: The tour was fantastic! Our guide was knowledgeable and the itinerary was well planned. Highly recommend!

reviews.author: Jane Smith
reviews.reviewDescription: The booking process was smooth and the customer service was excellent. The accommodation exceeded our expectations.

reviews.author: Michael Brown
reviews.reviewDescription: We had a wonderful time. The tour was affordable and well worth the money. Would book again.

reviews.author: David Black
reviews.reviewDescription: One of the best experiences we've had. The locations were great and guise was super.
